COMMAND.NAME: setbuffervariable
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Assign a variable with variableName to bufferName These variables are kept local to each buffer. This makes it convenient for Tcl scripts to hang information off of each buffer, then reference it later.
COMMAND.STATUS:
The setbuffervariable command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
variableName is not provided.
variableText is not provided.
